name: Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Gameboy Edition Volume II (Demo Version)
name_original: Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Gameboy Edition Volume II (Demo Version)
description:
Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Gameboy Edition Volume II (Demo Version)

The wait is over, Demo version of Toilet Bound Hanako-kun Gameboy Edition Volume II is here! Play as Yashiro Nene on your Gameboy, now with story based on Episode 7-12 of the anime! (Only first two episodes are available in demo version)

Please Check "Install instructions" before playing

Controls (For Web Version/AppImage Version players)

  • WASD - D-Pad (Move)
  • K/X - A (Interact, Skip Dialogue, Jump)
  • J/Z - B
  • Shift - Select
  • Enter - Start (Menu)

If you found bugs, problems or if you have suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

Original manga/anime by Aidairo 

Game by Hannor Smith

For iOS, iPadOS, and macOS users, it is recommend to play the .gb file version, due to Safari's mechanism to block auto-playing medias with sound. The latest version of Safari has more stricter blocking mechanism, so our web version of the game will not play any audio. The temporary solution I used on Volume I no longer work on newer version of GB Studio. Please visit the Github link for more explanation https://github.com/chrismaltby/gb-studio/issues/788
